title: The metadata schema
description: Metadata schema for all types of objects

type.description: The type of the object of the data being returned.

attributes.description: Schema representing the metadata associated with objects

dcFormat.description: A string describing the technical format of the resource. IANA media type. https://tdwg.github.io/ac/termlist/#dc_format

dcType.description: Type of object stored. Higher level than mediaType. https://tdwg.github.io/ac/termlist/#dc_type

acDigitizationDate.description: Date (ISO 8601 Date/Time) the first digital version was created. https://tdwg.github.io/ac/termlist/#ac_digitizationDate

xmpMetadataDate.description: Point in time (ISO 8601 Date/Time) recording when the last modification to metadata (not necessarily the media object itself) occurred. Automaticaly set. https://tdwg.github.io/ac/termlist/#xmp_MetadataDate

uploadedBy.description: Reference to the person who uploaded the object.

acHashFunction.description: The cryptographic hash function used to compute the value given in acHashValue. https://tdwg.github.io/ac/termlist/#ac_hashFunction

acHashValue.description: Hash of the uploaded object. Automaticaly generated on successful file upload. https://tdwg.github.io/ac/termlist/#ac_hashValue

xmpUsageTerms.description: Text instructions on how a resource can be legally used. https://tdwg.github.io/ac/termlist/#xmpRights_UsageTerms

xmpRightsWebStatement.description: A URL defining or further elaborating on the license statement. https://tdwg.github.io/ac/termlist/#xmpRights_WebStatement

dcRights.description: Information about rights held in and over the resource. https://tdwg.github.io/ac/termlist/#dc_rights

managedAttributes.description: List of key/value pairs of managed attributes.

acDerivedFrom.description: A URL that points to a meta data object that this meta derived from, such as a thumbnail. https://tdwg.github.io/ac/termlist/#ac_derivedFrom

type.description: The type of the dcCreater object.
